Trade/Device Name(s): Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System with Saf-T Holder Device and Male Luer Connector
Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System with Saf-T Holder and Saf-T Wing Device
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Saf-T Closed Blood Collection System for venous blood collection via direct draw or syringe transfer to vacuum tubes
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for direct blood draw into a vacuum tube or for syringe blood draw and transfer to fill vacuum tubes when attached to a peripheral IV catheter at the time of catheter placement
